name: cross-chain-dao-treasury-automation
description: The first DAO treasury autopilot with cross-chain intelligence - Reactive Network Hackathon Entry

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:reactive && npm run deploy:sepolia && npm run deploy:arbitrum
scripts.fund:sepolia: TREASURY_ADDRESS=$SEPOLIA_TREASURY USDC_ADDRESS=$SEPOLIA_USDC hardhat run scripts/fund-treasury.js --network sepolia
scripts.fund:arbitrum: TREASURY_ADDRESS=$ARBITRUM_TREASURY USDC_ADDRESS=$ARBITRUM_USDC hardhat run scripts/fund-treasury.js --network arbitrumSepolia
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:reactive && npm run verify:sepolia && npm run verify:arbitrum
scripts.hackathon:deploy: npm run deploy:all && npm run configure && npm run configure:sepolia && npm run configure:arbitrum
scripts.hackathon:full: npm run hackathon:test && npm run hackathon:deploy && npm run hackathon:verify
scripts.hackathon:submit: npm run health-check && npm run gas-analysis && npm run submission
